item.title: Pumpkin Spice Monkey Bread for Fall Mornings
item.description: Indulge in the warm, comforting flavors of fall with this Pumpkin Spice Monkey Bread. Perfectly sweet and easy to pull apart, it's a delightful treat for family breakfasts. Try it today for a cozy morning!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cans refrigerated biscuit dough
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 2 tablespoons pumpkin pie spice
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, melted
  • 1 cup pumpkin puree

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix sugar and pumpkin pie spice.
  3. Cut biscuit dough into quarters and toss in the sugar mixture.
  4. Layer the dough pieces in a bundt pan, drizzling pumpkin puree and melted butter between layers.
  5. Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden brown.
  6. Let cool for 10 minutes before inverting onto a plate.
